title: Look Who's Talking
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090731144330im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Scann0011_4677.gif)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090731144330im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Scann001_4149.gif)

Can anyone ID the “Look Who’s Talking” typeface in image 1 and the three others in image 2.

Thanks much,  
MOCPA
author: MOCPA

comments.content: The fonts in image 2 should be Thesis TheSerif and TheSans from [LucasFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20090731144330/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/)
